synopsis.text: Their leader incapacitated, Team Rabbits rallies under a new commander in the latest installment of Majestic Prince. Izuru, once the fearless leader, lies in a coma, the result of a brutal encounter with his arch-nemesis, Jiart. Asagi, his brother, now assumes the mantle of leadership, but can he fill the formidable shoes left by Izuru? With no room for hesitation, Asagi and Team Rabbits brace themselves to confront an enemy more chilling than any they've previously encountered. Amidst an interstellar war, the stage is set for a spectacle of mecha combat and riveting drama in Majestic Prince: Genetic Awakening, a completely new storyline slated for release this fall, as announced at AnimeJapan 2016.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
